entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
